Container.Name: Javinizer
Container.Overview: A commandline and GUI based PowerShell module used to scrape metadata and sort your local Japanese Adult Video (JAV) files into a media library compatible format.

Config.Name: jvSettings.json
Config.Description: This location contains files from your host that need to be accessible by the application.<br>Container path: /home/jvSettings.json

Config.Name: /mnt
Config.Description: This location contains files from your host that need to be accessible by the application.<br>Container path: /mnt

Config.Name: Port for GUI
Config.Description: Port used to access the application's GUI

Container.Description: A commandline and GUI based PowerShell module used to scrape metadata and sort your local Japanese Adult Video (JAV) files into a media library compatible format.
